alert.note: Alert for Alleghany; Bath (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 4:32AM EST until January 07 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SATURDAY TO 1 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation of snow, sleet, and freezing rain expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Alleghany VA and Bath Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM Saturday to 1 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Untreated roads and sidewalks will become slick and hazardous. Bridges and overpasses will be most susceptible to ice. Ice accumulations on trees and power lines may result in downed tree limbs and scattered power outages.
info.instruction: Plan on poor travel conditions. Reduce speed and allow extra time to reach your destination. Postpone travel if possible. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
